tetris.gui

Class TetrisFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • tetris.gui.TetrisFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class TetrisFrame
extends Object
implements Runnable
    The frame for all the content displayed during the game.
    Author:
    isjani
